currentTask: Building a modern, professional countdown web application called "Hourglass" for tracking special events. So far we've created the basic directory structure and added index.html and styles.css files with a sleek, responsive UI featuring modern fonts and styled components. We need to continue by creating the JavaScript functionality to make the application interactive.
contextSummary: Building a modern, professional countdown web application called "Hourglass" for tracking special events. So far we've created the basic directory structure and added index.html and styles.css files with a sleek, responsive UI featuring modern fonts and styled components. We need to continue by creating the JavaScript functionality to make the application interactive.
